title: About me
text: Boxing, bartending and football are near and dear to my heart.

title: Daniel Odunsi
text:
I‚Äôm Daniel Odunsi, a final-year Business Studies student at Dublin City University (DCU) specialising in Data Analytics. My passion lies at the intersection of business strategy, financial operations and data-driven decision-making.
I‚Äôve gained hands-on experience through internships at Novo Nordisk, Cantor Fitzgerald, and Ernst & Young, where I contributed to financial reporting, client services, and corporate strategy. These experiences, combined with my coursework in Business Processes & Lean Thinking and Financial Theory, have sharpened my analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Beyond academics, I take pride in leadership and community engagement. As Vice Chairman of DCU Boxing Club, I oversee club operations, events, and outreach, helping to foster a dynamic and inclusive environment.
I have broad technical proficiencies. This includes but is not limited to MS Office Suite, Python, and website design, while my communication skills and compentency in Spanish allow me to communicate effectively in diverse settings.
Whether I‚Äôm optimising operations, crafting innovative solutions, or even creating a signature cocktail (see ‚ÄòThe Odunsi‚Äôüçπ), I bring creativity, dedication, and a results-driven approach to everything I do.
Enjoy my journey! üöÄ

title: Job experience
text:
